name: Yacht Deluxe
description:
*** New Online Daily, Weekly, and Overall High Scores! ****

From the Makers of the hit dice game Farkle Deluxe...

Yacht Deluxe is an exciting dice game for the iPhone and iPod Touch. You may also know this game as Cheerio, Yot, Yam, Yahtzee™ or General. Players take turns rolling five dice to score big with a straight, full house, four of a kind, Yacht, or Chance combination.

Challenge your friends and family or go head to head with up to 3 clever computer players. Yacht Deluxe also supports Solitaire play, with the option to post your high scores to the global leaderboard.

3D graphics, sound effects, and physics bring the dice rolling action to life. Customize your game by naming your human and computer players, choosing from 16 player images, and setting computer difficulty.

Yacht Deluxe Features:
-Play versus the computer with up to 3 skilled AI opponents
-Up to 4 human players
-Customize player names and choose from 16 player images
-4 Levels of computer difficulty
-3D graphics and animation
-Global Leaderboard of Daily, Weekly, and Overall High Scores
-Option to turn dice rolling off to speed up game play
-How to Play and Tips
-Sound Effects enhance gaming experience
-Save your game where you left off
-Statistics: Keep track of your total wins and losses, current winning streak, average and highest scores
-Online scoring: Compete against the world for the highest daily, weekly, and all-time scores.

Yahtzee™ is a registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc.

Try Yacht Deluxe today!

Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.
